content:
Some organizations automatically record calls for training and quality purposes. However, customers and companies may prefer not to record certain information for privacy and legal compliance reasons. To honor customer's privacy and protect your company, allow agents to pause the recording when sensitive information is exchanged.

This feature requires specific permissions:
 
Manage Profiles and Permission Sets
Assign Permission Sets

The feature is available with Service Cloud Voice using Amazon Connect or Partner Telephony from Amazon Connect, or Partner Telephony.

To let agents suspend and resume call recording:

* Ensure your telephony provider offers this feature.
* Clone the Contact Center Agent permission set for an Amazon Connect contact center (or the Contact Center Agent (Partner Telephony) permission set).
* Add the Control Call Recording user permission to it.
* Assign the modified permission set to users.
title: Control Voice Call Recordings for Agents
